page.title: 20Clubs
page.content:
Bowls - Mr Kitching and his son are both members of the club. There are roughly 40 members in the club. Mr.Cardow is the secretary, they play most nights in the summer but during the winter they go to the indoor green in Thornaby Sports Pavilion.
All Saints Church is very nice, Because you can hear squeaking of mice, If you look up to the ceiling You might just see some of the plaster peeling, But if you look up higher than that, You might just see the remains of a bat! But if you look just outside the church, You might just see a little bird perched.
